form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION, 230 Part I

full_text: OMB APPROVAL NO. 1405-0015 EXPIRES: 8-31-92 ESTIMATED BURDEN: 1 HOUR APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION PART I - BIOGRAPHIC DATA INSTRUCTIONS: Complete one copy of this form for yourself and each member of your family, regardless of age, who will immigrate with you. Please print or type your answer to all questions. Questions that are Not Applicable should be so marked. If there is insufficient room on the form, answer on a separate sheet using the same numbers as appear on the form. Attach the sheet to this form. WARNING: Any false statement or concealment of a material fact may result in your permanent explusion from the United States. This form (OF-230 PART I) is Part I of two parts which, together with Optional Form OF-230 PART II, constitute the complete Application for Immigrant Visa and Alien Registration. 1. FAMILY NAME FIRST NAME MIDDLE NAME DESAI, BATUKLAL CHHAGANLAL 2. OTHER NAMES USED OR BY WHICH KNOWN (If married woman, give maiden name) - 3. FULL NAME IN NATIVE ALPHABET (If Roman letters not used) 4. DATE OF BIRTH 5. AGE 6. PLACE OF BIRTH (Day) (Month) (Year) (City or town) (Province) (Country) AUG - 1907 90 YEARS AHMEDABAD , GUJARAT INDIA , 7. NATIONALITY (If dual national, 8. SEX 9. MARITAL STATUS give both) Male Single (Never married) Married Widowed Divorced Separated INDIAN Female Including my present marriage, I have been married ONE times. 10. PERSONAL DESCRIPTION 11. OCCUPATION 5' - G iNCHES a. Color of hair WHITE c. Height RETIRED b. Color of eyes BLACK d. Complexion BROWN 12. MARKS OF IDENTIFICATION 13. PRESENT ADDRESS NONE 527-A 16th ROAD. RAM LAXMI NIVAS, FLAT #501 KHAR , BOMBAY - 400052 Telephone number: Home 646-2647 Office. NONE 14. NAME OF SPOUSE (Maiden or family name) (First name) (Middle name) DESAI PRIYAMVADA B. , Date and place of birth of spouse: MARCH 9th 1917 AHMEDABAD Address of spouse (If different from your own): DECEASED 15. LIST NAME, DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH, AND ADDRESSES OF ALL CHILDREN NAME DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH ADDRESS (If different from your own) CD DRUPAD B. DESAI JAN. 8th- 1940, AHMEDABAD 13459 SORGHUM COURT, HIGHLAND, MARYLAND ( 2) DUSHYANT 3. DESAI Oct. 1,1946 AUMEDA- 11717 CHADWICK ROAD, CORONA, CALIFORNIA -BAY ( 3 HARSHAD B. DESAI JAN. 31 st 1942 AHMEDABAD 527-A 16th ROAD, RAMLAXMINIVAS KHAR FLAT H 502 BOMBAY ( 4) FOIA (b)(6) THIS FORM MAY BE OBTAINED GRATIS AT CONSULAR OFFICES OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA OPTIONAL FORM 230 Part I (ENGLISH) NSN 7540-00-130-8317 REVISED 4-91 50230(1)-101 Previous editions obsolete DEPT.
